titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2989) making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation and Treasury, and independent agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2989) making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation and Treasury, and independent agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2004, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-258, by Mr. Reynolds.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2989.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 101.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 351.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 240 - 173 (Roll no. 463).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 178 (Roll no. 464).

action.text: Mr. Obey moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Reynolds moved to table the motion to reconsider.
On motion to table the motion to reconsider Agreed to by recorded vote: 205 - 180 (Roll no. 465).

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2989 (FY 2004 Departments of Transportation and Treasury, and independent agencies appropriations).
